column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=I 've never been for any war .
#Text=I try to avoid altercation on any level , be it emotional , physical , or political .
#Text=But there are some wars I think that are necessary .
#Text=History has shown this .
#Text=Was this one necessary ?
#Text=I do n't know .
#Text=Twenty years from now we 'll have to figure that out .
#Text=I hope that we 've all learned something from it .
#Text=What is your feeling toward the Iraq War now ?
#Text=It 's a mess .
#Text=It 's a mess .

#Text=We went in to get a job done , get Hussein out of there , liberate the Iraqi people as was dictated in the 1998 Liberation Act that Senator Lieberman helped draft and President Clinton put out there .
#Text=President Bush , Congress and the American people supported going in there .
#Text=I 'm not going to backtrack :
#Text=I did support going in there , and even as an artist and a poet , and as a freak , I made a decision , that it was time to take this guy out .
#Text=I spoke with many Iraqi Americans who live in my neighborhood who also supported that .
#Text=Lebanese and Iranian friends I have supported it .
#Text=One of my childhood friends , Adel Nehme , came out of Beirut , Lebanon around 1972 .
#Text=We met in kindergarten and we 've been friends ever since .
#Text=He was someone who escaped that turmoil .
#Text=His family brought him to New Jersey specifically to pull him out of that hell , like the way my father took us out of the gangland hell of the South Bronx .
#Text=Like any father would do , to protect his family .
#Text=Do you still feel the Iraq War is protecting us , and that the original reasons you supported it are still valid ?
#Text=It 's a mess .
#Text=The original reasons ?
#Text=Yes .
#Text=Looking back , hindsight is always 20/20 .
#Text=Unlike many artists , I have vocally supported the war .
#Text=Many artists who support this war wo n't say that .
#Text=Ron Whitehead is a dear friend .
#Text=We have mutual respect for each other but we disagree on a lot of issues .
#Text=Nevertheless , there 's only one man I want fighting in the trenches of life with me , and that 's Ron Whitehead .
#Text=When you look at the state of the world , what five descriptors come to mind ?
#Text=Chaos .
#Text=Yearning for peace .
#Text=Confusion .
#Text=Desperation .
#Text=Hope .
#Text=And are you hopeful ?
#Text=Yes .
#Text=Where do you get that hope from ?
#Text=My faith in the human spirit .
#Text=I think people are inherently good .

#Text=Joe Benigno said , " No one would question a poet writing about love for a woman , but when you ’re a fan of a team , the emotional attachment is even stronger , because women come and go , but your team never changes . "
#Text=Do you think that analogy really holds , because you are attracted to the Mets , and you are attracted to women , and the players on both of those teams in your life change .
